overview:
Dan leads sales activity in Public and Enterprise sectors.

Executive Vice President of Business Strategy, INgage Networks, and former President and CEO of MOVO Mobile, Dan not only brings an extensive background in mobile technology, but also an unparalleled vision of the social networking industry and its application to interactive community management. His leadership continues to enable the nationâ€™s forward-thinking companies to engage consumers through online and mobile platforms, thus connecting brands with individuals, wherever they roam.

Prior to joining INgage Networks, Miller founded BizTank, Startup Florida Ventures, Pongo Software and PlanetResume.com. He earned his Bachelors Degree from Brandeis University and completed the Birthing of Giants program at MIT. Dan is a nationally recognized speaker and expert on leveraging technology to strengthen competitive positioning.
